dates.1942: Born on January 14, 1942 in the village of Vysoky Gorodets of the Tolochinsky district
dates.1958: Made her debut in poetry in the republican magazines “Polymya”, “Vyaselka”, “Worker i syalyanka”
dates.1964: Membership in the Union of Writers of the USSR
dates.1975: Translated into Belarusian the book “Wild Dog of the Dingo, or the Tale of First Love” by R. Fraerman
dates.2012: Died July 15, 2012 at the age of 70
